name: Lowstone
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2021 in ~3days.

The game plays in a similar manner as other well known card games like magic the gathering or hearthstone.

The AI is super random and probably won't be a real threat but I might update that later.

I didn't have the time to add so many cards yet though. Also there's just one unique deck for now used by both the player and the AI.
